My Projects

A collection of my work in programming, science, and engineering

Featured Projects

Stick Together

A multiplayer web game where players work together to solve puzzles by manipulating physics-based objects. Built with TypeScript and Matter.js for realistic physics simulation.

TypeScript Matter.js WebSockets Node.js

FOMASC Website

A modern website for the Friends of Madison Area Science Center, featuring event information, membership details, and a blog section. Built with a focus on accessibility and user experience.

HTML/CSS JavaScript WordPress Responsive Design

Science Olympiad Projects

Codebusters Practice Tool

A Python-based tool for practicing Codebusters events, featuring various cipher implementations and practice problems. Includes a user-friendly interface for testing different encryption methods.

Python Cryptography GUI

Microbe Mission Database

A comprehensive database of microorganisms and their characteristics, designed to help Science Olympiad teams prepare for the Microbe Mission event.

Python SQLite Data Analysis

Personal Projects

Personal Website

A retro-modern personal portfolio website showcasing my projects and interests. Built with HTML, CSS, and a touch of JavaScript for interactivity.

HTML CSS JavaScript Responsive Design

Arduino Weather Station

A DIY weather station built with Arduino, featuring temperature, humidity, and pressure sensors. Data is logged and can be viewed through a web interface.

Arduino C++ IoT Web Development
